items.title: Wikipedia Licenses AI Access to Microsoft, Meta and Others Amid Rising Costs and Falling Traffic
items.snippet:
Wikipedia has signed AI content licensing deals with Microsoft, Meta and others as automated bots drive up costs and human traffic declines. The move aims to balance openness with sustainability.
The post Wikipedia Licenses AI Access to Microsoft, Meta and Others Amid Rising Costs and Falling Traffi...

items.title: Flipkart to Launch Conversational AI Shopping Assistant ‘SLAP’
items.snippet:
Flipkart is joining the likes of Walmart and Amazon with the launch of the conversational AI shopping assistant SLAP next week to offer personalised products to consumers

items.title: India’s Competition Regulator Warns Apple It Will Proceed With Antitrust Case If Non-Cooperation Continues
items.snippet:
The Competition Commission of India (CCI) has warned tech giant Apple that it will proceed with the company's antitrust case in India unilaterally if it does not see visible cooperation soon.
The post India’s Competition Regulator Warns Apple It Will Proceed With Antitrust Case If Non-Cooperation Co...

items.title: YouTube Updates Monetisation Policy for Controversial Videos, But Gaps Remain
items.snippet:
YouTube has updated its monetisation policy for controversial content, allowing ads on some non-graphic and dramatised videos. However, gaps remain in how the platform defines and enforces these rules.
The post YouTube Updates Monetisation Policy for Controversial Videos, But Gaps Remain appeared fi...

items.title: Questions to Consider Newsletter: January 2026 Edition
items.snippet:
Is forced consent becoming a policy? And where does the buck stop when algorithms control gig workers? Ponder about these questions and more in this special edition newsletter.

items.title: US Bets on AI Agents to Reshape Military Decision-Making
items.snippet:
The AI Strategy memo says the US aims to achieve military AI dominance by identifying and eliminating bureaucratic barriers and using US AI models to reconceptualise legacy approaches. 
The post US Bets on AI Agents to Reshape Military Decision-Making appeared first on MEDIANAMA.

items.title: YouTube Adds Parental Controls To Limit Shorts For Teen Accounts
items.snippet:
YouTube has rolled out new parental controls that limit the screen time of teenagers via limiting Shorts for teen accounts on the platform.
The post YouTube Adds Parental Controls To Limit Shorts For Teen Accounts appeared first on MEDIANAMA.

items.title: Ratings and Reviews Blocked for Three More Telugu Films on BookMyShow
items.snippet:
Ratings for three more Telugu films have been blocked on BookMyShow following a Bengaluru civil court order. The move expands earlier restrictions placed on Sankranti releases.
The post Ratings and Reviews Blocked for Three More Telugu Films on BookMyShow appeared first on MEDIANAMA.

items.title: US-Based Investment Management Firm Set To Acquire 23% Stake In Groww AMC For Rs 580 Crore
items.snippet:
US-based State Street Global Advisors is set to acquire a 23% stake in Groww AMC for Rs 580 crore, as per a regulatory filing from Groww.
The post US-Based Investment Management Firm Set To Acquire 23% Stake In Groww AMC For Rs 580 Crore appeared first on MEDIANAMA.

items.title: CCPA Fines Flipkart, Probes Meta Over Illegal Walkie-Talkies Sale
items.snippet:
In both cases, walkie-talkies were sold without proper frequency disclosure despite an earlier crackdown on platforms like JioMart and new guidelines for sales in June 2025.
